WorkItem.ClosedComment: The elemental module is completely outdated and non-functional.
WorkItem.Description:
When I try to load my Elemental shaman, it brings up all my gear and the correct spec.  But the simulated dps is 1 and the bars on the side for equipment that will normally tell me "Sustained DPS" or "Burst DPS" are not visible.  It seems like there is an issue with computing the DPS.  When I switch to Enhance or to Resto the bars engage and it shows new equipment that would be upgrades, but for Elemental is just show all the gear and shows it doing 0 dps to include the 372 gear.  I did a search for the forum about other elemental shaman with the issue and didn't find much but it could be something that affects other classes too and was in that post.  I've tried Rawr on my other toons and works just fine, just not my elemental spec.
Rawr: Rawr4 V.4.0.12b
Character: Shammerr
Server: Shadow Council

Comments.Message: Notice that the bottom status bar says "Cata Ready: Not."  I know it's not a great answer, but whoever is maintaining it is working on it, but it hasn't reached release status, apparently.
Bummer this is so broken.  I had come to rely on Rawr for farming gear... sigh.

There currently isn't anyone working on the elemental module, unfortunately.  I'm interested in contributing, but looking at the code I don't know exactly were to start.  I may look into it over the next week or two...  In the mean time you can use AskMrRobot for gear score/lists, SimulationCraft for stat-weights, and WoWReforge for reforging.
